bioAsHtml: I am working @IBM, promoting Bluemix platform for cognitive solutions based on Web & Mobile App, IoT (Internet of Things) and Blockchain I have a Master degree in IT from France with a specialization on software design. I am a Java EE & Javascript expert and also focused on Spring technologies. I have developed an expertise on Blockchain technology at IBM using Hyperledger for Ecosystem developers & startup Europe & IBM Nice Garage
bio:
I am working @IBM, promoting Bluemix platform for cognitive solutions based on Web & Mobile App, IoT (Internet of Things) and Blockchain
I have a Master degree in IT from France with a specialization on software design. I am a Java EE & Javascript expert and also focused on Spring technologies.
I have developed an expertise on Blockchain technology at IBM using Hyperledger for Ecosystem developers & startup Europe & IBM Nice Garage
